description:
Puzzle & Dragons: Games For Kids - Is your little pilot a big lover of dragons or monsters? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the games found in the Dragon Games For Kids: Puzzle App. This exciting activity app is filled with engaging dragon roar, crying and flying sounds your little child can explore in the dragon city...but the Dragon Puzzle Games For Kids doesn't end there.

The activity app also comes with a dragon matching game , and many beautiful and rare monster puzzle games.
Designed for 2 years and up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a dragon is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of dragons and monsters
- 3 fun memory games of funny dragon pictures
- 8 Real, high quality puzzles for 3 difficulty level with legendary dragon pictures
- Free, Ads support development of future updates and new games for kids.

Another amazingly cool feature to the Dragon Games For Kids Free makes it even more awesome then just matching- your little viking must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the little monster game shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing Puzzle & Dragons: games for kids also promotes:
-Fine motor skills.
-Memory and recognition skills.
-Hand eye coordination.
-Early math concepts.
-Legend knowledge
